original_title: What's in the Bible? Volume 6: A Nation Divided
overview: Volume 6 A Nation Divided includes TWO 25-minute episodes:  The Big Split - Israel is split in two, and the prophet Elijah faces off with the 450 prophets of Baal to prove that Israel’s God is the true God.  The End of Israel - A bunch of unfaithful kings lead to the end of Israel and Judah, but Isaiah has an amazing message in Israel’s darkest hour!
title: What's in the Bible? Volume 6: A Nation Divided
